bio:
Arnskar Ember-Master is a Nord man and a member of the Thieves Guild. He is bald-headed and clean shaven. He is a talented blacksmith who can usually be found in The Ragged Flagon, near three other merchants named Syndus (Bosmer man, fletcher), Herluin Lothaire (Breton man, apothecary), and Vanryth Gatharian (Dunmer man, blacksmith).
Arnskar sells and buys weapons, armor, and smithing supplies. His shop is in an alcove on the north wall, contains a forge, grindstone and workbench.
Quotes:
"They don't call me the Ember-Master for nothing. What do you need?"
"Looking for the best smith in Skyrim? You found him."
"Need your weapon repaired? Or can I interest you in a new one?"
name: Arnskar Ember-Master
